thread.title: Mum-of-two’s Tinder boyfriend of 14 months turns out to be married serial cheater who used Bollywood actor’s photo to woo women online
thread.title_full: Mum-of-two’s Tinder boyfriend of 14 months turns out to be married serial cheater who used Bollywood actor’s photo to woo women online

author: adevlin
title: Mum-of-two’s Tinder boyfriend of 14 months turns out to be married serial cheater who used Bollywood actor’s photo to woo women online
text:
Opinion 'HE USED ME LIKE A HOTEL WITH BENEFITS' Mum-of-two’s Tinder boyfriend of 14 months turns out to be married serial cheater who used Bollywood actor’s photo to woo women online 
Anna Rowe wants police to take action against people who make a fake online profile for sex By AMANDA DEVLIN
